analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: GMS Score 44 signals a shift to Neutral as momentum pushed the score from 29. A 16.6% collapse in VIX (Fear) and a weaker DXY (Dollar) significantly improved global liquidity. While narrowing spreads show returning risk appetite, the sharp rally in Gold and Silver warns of underlying currency instability that the equity market may be ignoring. Investors should transition from defensive stances toward selective participation, remaining vigilant of the potential macro risks signaled by the surge in precious metals.

reports.EN: GMS Score 44 signals a shift to Neutral as momentum pushed the score from 29. A 16.6% collapse in VIX (Fear) and a weaker DXY (Dollar) significantly improved global liquidity. While narrowing spreads show returning risk appetite, the sharp rally in Gold and Silver warns of underlying currency instability that the equity market may be ignoring. Investors should transition from defensive stances toward selective participation, remaining vigilant of the potential macro risks signaled by the surge in precious metals.
reports.ES: El puntaje GMS de 44 marca una transiciÃ³n a territorio Neutral, impulsado por un impulso que elevÃ³ la cifra desde 29. Esta recuperaciÃ³n se debe a la caÃ­da del 16,6% en el VIX (miedo/volatilidad) y la debilidad del DXY (dÃ³lar/liquidez), mejorando la liquidez global. Aunque los diferenciales muestran apetito por el riesgo, el repunte del oro y la plata es una advertencia de inestabilidad cambiaria subyacente. Se recomienda pasar de una postura defensiva a una selectiva, vigilando estrechamente las seÃ±ales de los metales preciosos frente a la calma bursÃ¡til.

reports.ID: Skor GMS 44 menunjukkan transisi ke wilayah Netral, seiring momentum yang mendorong skor naik dari 29. Pemulihan didorong oleh penurunan VIX (Indeks Ketakutan) sebesar 16,6% dan pelemahan DXY (Kekuatan Dolar), yang meningkatkan likuiditas global. Meskipun penyempitan spread menunjukkan kembalinya selera risiko, lonjakan tajam pada Emas dan Perak adalah peringatan terhadap ketidakstabilan mata uang yang mungkin diabaikan pasar ekuitas. Investor harus beralih dari posisi defensif ke partisipasi selektif sambil tetap waspada terhadap risiko makro pasar logam.

reports.DE: Der GMS-Score von 44 signalisiert den Ãœbergang in den neutralen Bereich, nachdem das Momentum den Wert von 29 angehoben hat. Die Erholung wird durch den RÃ¼ckgang des VIX (Angstindex/VolatilitÃ¤t) um 16,6 % und einen schwÃ¤cheren DXY (DollarstÃ¤rke/LiquiditÃ¤t) getragen. WÃ¤hrend sinkende Spreads auf eine RÃ¼ckkehr des Risikoappetits hindeuten, ist der starke Anstieg von Gold und Silber eine kritische Warnung vor WÃ¤hrungsinstabilitÃ¤t. Anleger sollten von defensiven Positionen zu selektiven KÃ¤ufen Ã¼bergehen, aber die Signale der MetallmÃ¤rkte als potenzielles systemisches Risiko ernst nehmen.
reports.FR: Le score GMS de 44 indique une transition vers une zone neutre, le momentum ayant propulsÃ© le score depuis 29. Ce redressement est dÃ» Ã  la chute de 16,6 % du VIX (peur/volatilitÃ©) et Ã  l'affaiblissement du DXY (dollar/liquiditÃ©), amÃ©liorant la liquiditÃ© mondiale. Bien que le resserrement des spreads suggÃ¨re un retour de l'appÃ©tit pour le risque, la flambÃ©e de l'or et de l'argent constitue un avertissement critique sur l'instabilitÃ© monÃ©taire ignorÃ©e par les actions. Il convient de passer d'une posture dÃ©fensive Ã  une participation sÃ©lective, tout en surveillant les signaux de risque des mÃ©taux.
